alert.note: Alert for Cambria (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 11:01PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CAMBRIA COUNTY THROUGH 1130 PM EDT... At 1101 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nanty-Glo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ebensburg, Nanty-Glo, Patton, Cresson, Gallitzin, Vinco, Loretto, Lilly, Carrolltown, Sankertown, Belsano, Mundys Corner, Colver, Vintondale, Tunnelhill, Ashville, Chest Springs, Cassandra, Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site and Saint Francis University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
